name: opencc-extension
description: A browser extension to convert webpages between different Chinese variants.

scripts.start:firefox: concurrently "cross-env MODE=development BROWSER=firefox npm run build:watch" "wait-on ./build/manifest.json && npm run start"
scripts.start:chromium: concurrently "cross-env MODE=development BROWSER=chrome npm run build:watch" "wait-on ./build/manifest.json && npm run start -- -t chromium"
scripts.start:edge: concurrently "cross-env MODE=development BROWSER=edge npm run build:watch" "wait-on ./build/manifest.json && npm run start -- -t chromium"
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.dist:chrome: cross-env MODE=production BROWSER=chrome node build.mjs ./dist/chrome && web-ext build -s ./dist/chrome -a . -n opencc.chrome.zip --overwrite-dest
scripts.dist:firefox: cross-env MODE=production BROWSER=firefox node build.mjs ./dist/firefox && web-ext build -s ./dist/firefox -a . -n opencc.firefox.zip --overwrite-dest
scripts.dist:edge: cross-env MODE=production BROWSER=edge node build.mjs ./dist/edge && web-ext build -s ./dist/edge -a . -n opencc.edge.zip --overwrite-dest
scripts.dist: concurrently "npm run dist:chrome" "npm run dist:firefox" "npm run dist:edge" && rimraf ./dist
